snippet: After a decade of growth and development, the country has hit a rough patch. Now it needs reforms and public investment.
abstract: Editorial contends Brazilian Pres Dilma Rousseff needs to push through policy reforms and public investment projects to revive growth in the country and bring inflation under control; notes that Brazil has seen impressive social advancements in a short time and now its citizens expect more from their leaders.
lead_paragraph: After a decade of growth and development, the country has hit a rough patch. Now it needs reforms and public investment.
